mapper.insert: insert into balance_account (balance_date, balance_yesterday_assets, balance_assets) values (sysdate, #{yesterdayAssets}, #{Assets})
mapper.select: select balance_date as dates, balance_yesterday_assets as yesterdayAssets, balance_assets as Assets from balance_account where to_char(balance_date, 'yyyy-MM-dd') = to_char(sysdate-1, 'yyyy-MM-dd')
select balance_date as dates, balance_yesterday_assets as yesterdayAssets, balance_assets as Assets from balance_account where to_char(balance_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') = to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd')

select balance_date as dates, balance_yesterday_assets as yesterdayAssets, balance_assets as Assets from balance_account where to_char(balance_date, 'yyyy-MM-dd') >= #{startdate} and to_char(balance_date, 'yyyy-MM-dd') <= #{enddate} order by balance_date asc

select PC.pay_no as "no" , PC.pay_money as "money" , PC.pay_type as "type" , PC.pay_changedate as "changedate" , PC.pay_etc_reason as "reason" , PC.change_type_id as "changeType.id" , CT.change_type_info as "changeType.info" from pay_change PC, pay_change_type CT where PC.change_type_id = CT.change_type_id and to_char(PC.pay_changedate, 'yyyy-MM-dd') = to_char(sysdate-1, 'yyyy-MM-dd')
